metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1254 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Tor before 0.2.8.12 might allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (client crash) via a crafted hidden service descriptor.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1254` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.3.2.10-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.3.2.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.2.10-1').
